channel.title: Newest sig
channel.description:
For sotw on another sight... i replaced with the panda one i made earlier. I just love watching you FAGGETS try and flame. lmfao! [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/281rhck.jpg[/img]
[center][img]http://moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Stop trying to stir shit up. If people don't like your work, it's not flaming. Calling people faggots is. [/center]

item.title: Newest sig
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

ImJordon:

I just love watching you FAGGETS try and flame.

Learn to spell, it’s “faggots”.
Anyways, I think would look better if it were brighter, perhaps with the polar bear brighter than the background.

item.title: Newest sig
item.dc:creator: @ImJordon ImJordon
item.description:
@ImJordon wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:2, topic:281247”]Your punishment is pending from the following offense sent by Jagex:

The panda bear seen in your picture is white. This may effect negros emotionally and physically. We have given your account a blackmark due to this offense. The main problem is we have many complaints as to why the panda bear was chosen to be white. This seemingly puts white pandas above black pandas which is a form of racism (No shit). Black panda bears may slur there words and use a more sufficient amount of drugs and stolen items, but that does NOT mean they should be left out of graphics or sigs. Don’t let it happen again,
Jagex
(Jarred’s Gay Ex-Boyfriend)

Thank you for your time.

But srsly you should totally make it like catching a fish that was shot out of a cannon. Get a pic of one of those salmon eating BROWN BROWN panda bears.

Anyways, i like how its a polar bear.[/quote]

When i said panda bear i ment i made a panda one earlier, and replaced that entry from sotw with this one.

Read full topic

The panda bear seen in your picture is white. This may effect negros emotionally and physically. We have given your account a blackmark due to this offense. The main problem is we have many complaints as to why the panda bear was chosen to be white. This seemingly puts white pandas above black pandas which is a form of racism (No shit).
